item.title: Getting Sun iLOM information within Linux
item.description: At work, I’m starting to implement OCS Inventory NG on our Linux boxes to keep track of hardware. Part of the plan is also that we have a MediaWiki installation for internal documentation, and articles for every host (named as the hostname). I’m going to pull data from …
item.dc:creator: admin

item.title: Hardware Inventory System
item.description: After a few crazy weeks at work, the pay check is finally here, and I’ve decided to allocate some of the money to hardware upgrades of my personal machines. While Nagios gives me a good idea of where performance is a problem, I’m still running a large amount …
